content:
From: Mateja Jamnik <mateja.jamnik@cl.cam.ac.uk>
Hello:

Pietro Lio and I are currently advertising 2 positions, a research associate and a senior research associate for the project on personalised medicine, or more specifically on Integrated Cancer Medicine. We want to apply machine learning and logic reasoning to integrate heterogeneous cancer data which would be used for personalised medicine via clinical decision support systems. Could you please pass on the details to any people that may be interested?

http://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/18149/ <http://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/18149/>
http://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/18150/ <http://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/18150/>

Thank you,
Mateja

mateja jamnik • univ of cambridge computer laboratory
mateja.jamnik@cl.cam.ac.uk • http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mj201
